text: CCB Life Platform Personal Information Protection Policy
Dear users: Our bank has updated the "Personal Information Protection Policy". The update content is mainly: 1. How can our bank collect your personal information;
label: Policy Change

text: 2. How do I use your personal information;
label: Policy Change

text: 3. How do we handle minor information.
label: Policy Change

text: Version update date: July 14, 2022
Version Effective Date: July 27, 2022

China Construction Bank Co., Ltd. Zhejiang Branch (hereinafter referred to as "my bank") knows the importance of personal information to you and will try its best to protect your personal information security.
Integrity principles, information quality principles, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Our bank adheres to the following principles to protect your personal information: the principles of consistency and responsibility, the principles of clear purpose, the principle of consent, the principles of necessity, the principles of safety, the principle of openness and transparency, the principles of subject participation, the principles of integrity, and the principle of information quality.

text: At the same time, our bank promises to take corresponding security measures in accordance with the law to protect your personal information.

We hope to clearly introduce you how to deal with your personal information when using the product and/or services of the use of the CCB life platform through this personal information protection policy, and the access, correction, delete, and protecting this information we provide youWay.
This "Personal Information Protection Policy" will help you understand the following:
1.How does our trip collect and use your personal information
2.How does our trip use cookies and similar technologies
3.How to share, transfer and publicly disclose your personal information
4.How does our trip store and protect your personal information
5.The right to control personal information
6.How do we handle minor information
7.How to update this policy
8.How to contact me

[Special Tips] Before using the various products and/or services provided by the CCB Living Platform, please carefully read and fully understand this "Personal Information Protection Policy" (the key content we have bolded the font, please pay special attention) and make a special attention) and make it to make it.Choose accordingly.
If you have any questions about this personal information protection policy, you can contact our bank through the "how to contact me" through this personal information protection policy).

Please note that this policy is not applicable to other third -party products/services connected by your products/services ("Other third parties", including your trading counterparty, any third -party website, and third -party service providerWait), please refer to the hidden of the third party.
Private policy or similar statement.
1. How does our trip collect and use your personal information
Personal information refers to various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways.

Personal information includes names, birthdays, ID numbers, personal biometric information, communication and communication contact information, address, account information, property status, trajectory trajectory, etc.
Once it is leaked, wrong.

The law provides or abuses the security of people and property, which can easily lead to information such as personal reputation, physical and mental health damage or discriminatory treatment as personal sensitive information, mainly include: ID number, personal biometric information, financial accounts, credit reportingInformation, property information, transaction information, trading trajectory, health and physiological information, specific identities, personal information of minors under the age of 14, etc.
(1) How to collect information

In order to provide you with service and ensure the safety of your CCB living platform, in the process of using CCB Life Platform, our bank will collect your active input or information generated by your service during the service process:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Our travel will collect information you actively enter or due to service during the use of services.

text: 1. When you open the service of CCB Life Platform, according to laws and regulations and regulatory requirements, our bank will collect your mobile phone number to help you complete the CCB living platform registration. If you refuse to provide this information, you may not be able to open the CCB living platformOr unable to use the service of the CCB life platform normally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Our bank will collect your mobile phone number to help you complete the registration of CCB Life Plata.

text: 2. When you use the functions or services of CCB's life platform, for example, in the following situations, you may need to provide or authorize our bank to collect the user information required for the corresponding services.

First Party Collection Information

text: All the above information constitutes your order information. Our bank will use your order information to perform your identity verification, determine transactions, pay settlement, complete distribution, query orders for you, and provide customer service consultation and after -sales service;
